UIStyleSettings

Static class-like interface to centralise UI display settings & associated formatting.  Fen mentioned maybe possibly adding the capability to re-style the UI at run-time, at least as far as colours (and maybe fonts) goes, so I’m setting this up now.  I’m using it for custom components that I’m building, so it saves having to convert them over later.  Some (most) of these settings will need to be updated to match the “Tits standard” If I can work out how to do ObserverPattern style databindings, I can probably rig up all of the UI classes to recolour themselves if and when the properties here get changed; so styling the UI at runtime would just need an interface adding to change these values.  Neat, huh?

Author

Gedan
